message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to pay closer to $13,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the value we both see in the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500? This reflects the value it brings to both of us.
